biotools.summary:
an R package for differential gene expression analysis in Affymetrix/Thermo-Fisher whole transcriptome microarrays.

GCSscore is an R package that is available on GitHub that is also available in the BioConductor repository (release 3.10 and higher).

GCSscore: an R package for microarray analysis for Affymetrix/Thermo Fisher arrays.

For differential expression analysis of 3'IVT and WT-style microarrays from Affymetrix Thermo-Fisher.
